name: Play Store Word Break fix
description: Fix the weird word break that appears on the Google Play Store in Firefox.
additional_info:
Fix the weird word break that appears on the Google Play Store in Firefox.

Technically:
Google uses word-break: break-word; which doesn’t exist on the mdn or w3schools page, so I don’t know his purpose, but it only work on Chrome (maybe Safari).
So in Firefox (and maybe other browsers), break-word is ignored, and the reviews div inherits word-break: break-all which permits to break lines inside a word.
